infos.value: ...Nnngh...
Awake, are we?
To think you'd sleep in your own bed after returning to the castle.
You were waiting here until I woke up? You must be bored.
This siege is as good as squashed.
We'll be clearing out the rubble by the time Lord Sadali arrives.
Halt. Where are you going?
Where is Machérie?
Where indeed? Go find her yourself if you're so curious.
Then I shall do just that.
Uh-oh. Someone's coming!
...Do you know that guy?
Of course. That was Prince Sterne, the second prince of Leonis.
Whoa, really?
So why is Mister Second Prince idling around with traitors to Hourne?
That's...not really clear to me, either.
I guess Hourne isn't the only kingdom that's been split in two...
No, I...I can't believe that.
...Well, shall we get going?
Going...? To where?
Where do you think? To wherever Machérie is being kept!
